Signed-off-by: Jonas Kalderstam <jonas@kalderstam.se>

Fix problem with deleted remote files

Being deleted both locally and remotely meant a crash with
Dropbox backend. Add some null checks to prevent it.

Signed-off-by: Jonas Kalderstam <jonas@kalderstam.se>

Fix list properties being multiplied like hell

This would cause the file to grow and grow. Now replaces
all sort/style tags when changed.

Signed-off-by: Jonas Kalderstam <jonas@kalderstam.se>

Sync OrgSynchronizers in the background

Add a broadcast receiver that schedules regular background
synchronizations with the new backends. This is run on boot and
onCreate in the main activity. If none are enabled, then
the schedule is removed.

Signed-off-by: Jonas Kalderstam <jonas@kalderstam.se>

Complete notifications synchronized

Notifications would reappear after completing the task. The reason was
because an AsyncTask would handle the database operation of removing the
old notification, thus calling notifyPast before the reminder had been
cleared. Now everything is handled on a single thread. Classic race
condition.

Fixes #257

Signed-off-by: Jonas Kalderstam <jonas@kalderstam.se>

Latest translations included, bump version

Update gradle for new AndroidStudio and SDK

Signed-off-by: Jonas Kalderstam <jonas@kalderstam.se>

Workaround for Prefs Scrolling bug

This is a workaround for a platform bug reported here:
https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=26194

Scrolling the preferences would bring up the dialog for google account
as the top preference went out of view.
